import React, { Fragment, useState } from 'react'; import { Button, Field, Control, Input, Column, Section, Helpm, Label } from "rbx"; import { Redirect } from "react-router-dom"; function RegisterForm() { // Controlled form const [name, setName] = useState(""); const [email, setEmail] = useState(""); const [password, setPassword] = useState(""); // redirectiToLogin - After creating the account, the user is automatically directed to Login. const [redirectToLogin, setRedirectToLogin] = useState(false); // const [error, setError] = useState(false); return (
Login or
) } export default RegisterForm;
